Everything top rate Show More Show all reviews Amenities Parking Good for Kids Takes Reservations About Need To Know Info Where To Redeem Reviews Deeply hydrating facials aim to purify the complexion to help achieve a fabulous, youthful appearance and silk-like touch Book Online Through Groupon See availability and book your visit now, or book from desktop, phone or tablet by visiting MyGroupons and clicking Book Now! after your purchase. Spavia is all about you – you select treatments that best suit your needs and desires. Therapists and estheticians care about your well-being and provide each spa treatment in the most personalized, professional manner possible. Begin your relaxation by unwinding in our peaceful Spavia retreat room. Each guest is provided with a spa robe, spa sandals and a warmed aromatherapy neck pillow for the ultimate rest and relaxation. What to Expect Deeply relaxing facial Neck and shoulder massage Arm massage Deeply hydrating hand treatment Completed with Spavia dry mineral sunscreen Spavia Facials Signature Classic Refresh Facial: Refreshes and maintains all skin types for more hydrated, softer, and smoother skin. Our Spavia Signature Refresh facial begins with a thorough cleanse, exfoliation with Mandelic acid, and Mangosteen extracts to smooth and brighten your skin complexion. Rich Goji Berry antioxidants, hyaluronic acid and natural plant extracts will leave your skin hydrated and refreshed with a healthy glow. Age Defense Facial: Defend your skin from the aging process with a facial that hydrates, brightens, and tightens your skin. A blend of enzymes and alpha hydroxy acids, smooth, and tighten while a superior blend of active clinical brighteners gently fade discoloration for a radiant youthful glow. Infused with Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid to nourish and plump skin for the perfect anti-aging skincare treatment. Our Story | Spavia Winter Park | Winter Park, FL 32789 Book Now | CALL TO SCHEDULE Your Spa: Winter Park, FL 407.670.3200 My Account Careers Our Spa About Us Spavia Cares Spavia Green Spalosophy Blog Events Treatments Massage Therapy Men's Treatments Facials / Skin Care Body Treatments Beauty Packages Spalebrations New Spa Treatments Boost Membership Pricing Gift Cards Offers First Visit Our Offers Book Now Our Spa About Us Spavia Cares Spavia Green Spalosophy Blog Events Treatments Massage Therapy Men's Treatments Facials / Skin Care Body Treatments Beauty Packages Spalebrations New Spa Treatments Boost Membership Pricing Gift Cards Offers First Visit Our Offers Book Now CALL OUR SPA OUR SPA THE RIPPLING EFFECT OF WORKING TOGETHER AND MAKING A DIFFERENCE. EACH RIPPLE REPRESENTS ANOTHER LOCATION AND THE POWER OF GROWTH IN MAKING A DIFFERENCE. PURCHASE A GIFT CARD SPAVIA Winter Park DAY SPA IN Winter Park Relax. You deserve a break. Recenter. Immerse yourself in relaxation and tranquility. Renew. Recharged and refocused you can conquer all that the day has in store for you. Spavia Winter Park is all about you – you select treatments that best suit your needs and desires. Our therapists and estheticians care about your well-being and provide each spa treatment in the most personalized, professional manner possible. Begin your relaxation by unwinding in our peaceful Spavia retreat room. Each guest is provided with a spa robe, spa sandals and a warmed aromatherapy neck pillow for the ultimate rest and relaxation. Whether you desire a soothing massage or a rejuvenating body wrap, our specialists will assist you in creating the perfect day spa experience. Turn back the clock with a nourishing facial and finish your spa day with an all-natural beauty treatment. You will leave the spa looking – and feeling – your best. When you are looking for a break from the everyday stresses, we invite you to relax, recenter and renew at Spavia Winter Park . Schedule your relaxation today! SCHEDULE YOUR RELAXATION Spavia Winter Park 110 Orlando Avenue Suite 9 , Winter Park , FL 32789 407.670.3200 Hours of Operation Monday: 9am to 8pm Tuesday: 9am to 8pm Wednesday: 9am to 8pm Thursday: 9am to 8pm Friday: 9 to 8pm Saturday: 9am to 6pm Sunday: 11am to 6pm PURCHASE A GIFT CARD Spavia Memberships Available This year, say yes to self-care! Members enjoy special offers! LEARN MORE When the founders Allison and Marty Langenderfer created the Spavia brand, they wanted to create a name that reflected the products and services it offered and deliver results to help their guests relax, recenter, and renew. What’s in a name? Spavia- ‘via’ in many languages means route or pathway. Our interpretation of Spavia is the route or journey to wellness. Each of our guests have their own journey and at Spavia, it’s so important to create customized, result-driven treatments in a tranquil environment for our guests. It’s our guests’ journey and it begins at Spavia. It is such a humbling experience to know that since 2005, that has been our focus and today with our growth and owners, brand partners and Spavia team members, we are making a difference. Thank you for entrusting Spavia on your journey to wellness and being our guest. We are so grateful. OUR STORY On September 25, 2005, Spavia opened its doors with a mission and vision of making a positive difference in the world one guest at a time and delivering an exceptional experience our guests couldn’t live without. For us, it’s been about a journey, not a race to build a legacy and reputation of being the best, delivering the best and creating a Spavia culture that we are proud of each and every day. We are humbled and grateful for the opportunity to open our doors each day, create exceptional experiences and give back to our communities. Today, we are doing just that and our focus in creating the best experience with the best products and spa treatments is stronger than ever! Spavia is rapidly growing and with that comes great responsibility to ensure that we are offering the best to our guests, our teams, and our franchise owners. Thank you for being a part of the Spavia journey and welcome to the Spavia family! OUR AWARDS SlideShow JS/CSS Files Placed Here (Important) privacy policy | terms & conditions © Spavia. Renew. Recharged and refocused you can conquer all that the day has in store for you. Spavia is all about you – you select treatments that best suit your needs and desires. Our therapists and estheticians care about your well-being and provide each spa treatment in the most personalized, professional manner possible. Begin your relaxation by unwinding in our peaceful Spavia retreat room. Each guest is provided with a spa robe, spa sandals and a warmed aromatherapy neck pillow for the ultimate rest and relaxation. Whether you desire a soothing massage or a rejuvenating body wrap, our specialists will assist you in creating the perfect day spa experience. Turn back the clock with a nourishing facial and finish your spa day with an all-natural beauty treatment. You will leave the spa looking – and feeling – your best. When you are looking for a break from the everyday stresses, we invite you to relax, recenter and renew at Spavia. Schedule your relaxation today! SCHEDULE YOUR RELAXATION Allison Langenderfer Founder and President READ MORE Allison Langenderfer is President and Co-founder of Spavia. Allison is the passionate leader of Spavia focusing on design, creative and spa retail. Allison is a graduate of Cal Poly San Luis Obispo with an emphasis in marketing and a lifelong belief in ‘learning by doing’ attitude that has fueled personal growth throughout her career. Before founding Spavia, Allison was a professional buyer & regional manager for Macy's which was followed by a successful 12 year career in pharmaceutical sales. Allison drives the passion of Spavia from a focus on Spavia Cares to inspiring the community of franchise partners, team members around the nation. Allison has a personal passion for developing the curated retail experience of Spavia by building an amazing network of partners with world class products. Allison’s market driven approach includes skin care solutions along with relaxation products, and great gifts to make Spavia a go-to retail option in the community. Allison’s greatest personal success can be found at home with her three children who are now starting to forge careers of their own. Marty Langenderfer Founder and CEO READ MORE Marty Langenderfer is CEO and Co-founder of Spavia. Marty is driven to create innovative concepts that achieve excellence through technology, marketing, operating systems and scalable growth. As an entrepreneur, Marty has an unorthodox background starting first as a CPA at a big six accounting firm which then transitioned into an MBA at Cornell University’s Johnson Graduate School of Management. Shortly after, he joined American Airlines’ Sabre Division where he helped found Travelocity. Lessons learned from creating a world recognized brand helped Marty grow into his next venture as VP of DISH Network, where he focused on marketing, customer loyalty and customer service. During his tenure as an executive, the company grew from less than one million subscribers to over ten million. Marty’s years of expertise in finance, marketing, and operations enables him to lead the Spavia National team in delivering excellence. When the founders Allison and Marty Langenderfer created the Spavia brand, they wanted to create a name that reflected the products and services it offered and deliver results to help their guests relax, recenter, and renew. What’s in a name? Spavia- ‘via’ in many languages means route or pathway. Our interpretation of Spavia is the route or journey to wellness. Each of our guests have their own journey and at Spavia, it’s so important to create customized, result-driven treatments in a tranquil environment for our guests. It’s our guests’ journey and it begins at Spavia. It is such a humbling experience to know that since 2005, that has been our focus and today with our growth and owners, brand partners and Spavia team members, we are making a difference. Thank you for entrusting Spavia on your journey to wellness and being our guest. We are so grateful. OUR STORY On September 25, 2005, Spavia opened its doors with a mission and vision of making a positive difference in the world one guest at a time and delivering an exceptional experience our guests couldn’t live without. For us, it’s been about a journey, not a race to build a legacy and reputation of being the best, delivering the best and creating a Spavia culture that we are proud of each and every day. We are humbled and grateful for the opportunity to open our doors each day, create exceptional experiences and give back to our communities. Today, we are doing just that and our focus in creating the best experience with the best products and spa treatments is stronger than ever! Spavia is rapidly growing and with that comes great responsibility to ensure that we are offering the best to our guests, our teams, and our franchise owners.
